title: Typographic coffee table: "Alpha"
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017123555im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-2_4769.png)

If you have $900 burning a hole in your pocket, you could do worse than buying this wood type-replica coffee table.

[http://www.crateandbarrel.com/family.aspx?c=985&f=28528](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017123555/http:/www.crateandbarrel.com/family.aspx?c=985&f=28528 "http://www.crateandbarrel.com/family.aspx?c=985&f=28528")

[via Uncrate]
author: maxgraphic

comments.content:
The World is an insane place to search for sanity.  
Dezcom on 11.Dec.2006 7.50am

\*wants oh so badly...\*

...

\*remembers he doesn't have his own house\*

Ah well, it's not what you don't have or can't have, but what you do have.

Peace,  
JT
